data.name: NoHCDriveMessage
data.value:
No HCDrive inserted!
HCDrives are compressed files that contain chips, stages, and blueprints. Meant to be shared easily.
Ensure a HCDrive file or link to a file is in the clipboard and press LOAD.

data.name: LoadHCDriveFailedMessage
data.value:
No valid HCDrive inserted!
Ensure a HCDrive file is in the clipboard and press the Load button.

data.name: StageToExportMessage
ChipToExportMessage
BlueprintToExportMessage
StageToImportMessage
ChipToImportMessage
BlueprintToImportMessage
ExportSuccessMessage
data.value: Export successful. A new HCDrive is in the clipboard! You can now share it by pasting it in explorer or any other software supporting image content.

data.name: InstallFailedMessage
data.value:
Installation failed.
HCDrive content might be corrupted or incompatible.

data.name: InstallSuccessMessage
data.value:
Installation successful.
HCDrive content has been installed!
